mapper.select: SELECT cm.id, cm.star, cm.content, cm.create_at as createAt, cm.update_at as updateAt, cm.user_id as userId, cm.pitch_id as pitchId, u.fullname, u.avatar FROM comment cm join user u on u.id = cm.user_id where cm.pitch_id = #{pitch_id} and (#{user_id} is null or user_id = #{user_id}) Order By cm.update_at and cm.star DESC
Select COUNT(id) from comment where pitch_id = #{pitch_id} group by pitch_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment ( star, content, user_id, pitch_id) VALUES (#{star}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{pitchId});
